steps.title: Draw a lateral line connecting all four vertical lines in the middle.
steps.content: Draw a lateral line connecting all four vertical lines in the middle. This would look like a parallelogram.

steps.title: Draw a square on top of the parallelogram.
steps.content: Draw a square on top of the parallelogram. Darken the vertical lines below the parallelogram this will serve as the chairâ€™s legs.

steps.title: Add volume to the outline you made.
steps.content: Add volume to the outline you made.

steps.title: Draw swirls using curved lines on the chair to make it look like wood.
steps.content: Draw swirls using curved lines on the chair to make it look like wood.

steps.title: Start drawing the back portion of the chair.
steps.content: Start drawing the back portion of the chair. At first, it will just look like a bunch of horizontal lines.

steps.title: Draw the frame of the chair back so it connects to the previous lines you drew representing the back rest.
steps.content: Draw the frame of the chair back so it connects to the previous lines you drew representing the back rest.

steps.title: Finish drawing the rest of the backrest.
steps.content: Finish drawing the rest of the backrest. Now it's time to move on to the seat portion.

steps.title: Next, draw the chair's legs at the bottom of the chair's seat.
steps.content: Next, draw the chair's legs at the bottom of the chair's seat. The chair is beginning to come together now.

steps.title: Next, draw in any details you may want to add to your chair such as wood textures.
steps.content: Next, draw in any details you may want to add to your chair such as wood textures.

steps.title: Lastly, color your chair with the medium of choice if you wish.
steps.content: Lastly, color your chair with the medium of choice if you wish.
